  type: "dev project"
}, {

  summary: "Reworking of Rapid7's fundamentals page using C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",
  description: "Spearheaded back-end strategy, development, and front end development for Fundamentals pages. Lead development implementation that allowed for 80+ pages with existing data to be reworked, elevated, and dynamically populated",

}, {

  summary: "Refresh of Rapid7's customer pages using C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",
  description: "Lead back-end strategy, development, and QA efforts for three new customer-related page templates. Assisted with front-end development. Created multiple blocks and pages that dynamically pull in data to enhance content-editor's CMS experience",

}, {

  image: require('../img/homepage.png'),
  summary: "Building new Rapid7 hompeage blocks and designs using C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",

  type: "dev project"
}, {
  title: "OneTrust Cookie Compliance",
  stack: "JS, GTM, C#",
  image: require('../img/onetrust.png'),
  summary: "Implementing Rapid7's cookie compliance solution using JS, GTM, and OneTrust",

  link: "https://www.rapid7.com",

}, {

  description: "Implemented a brand new cookie compliance solution from OneTrust with multiple compliance models that integrate with GTM and our existing server-side cookie implementation",

  type: "dev project"

  title: "Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Page",
  stack: "C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",
  image: require('../img/DEI.png'),

  description: "Net-new back-end template to showcase a new theme, new block types, and Rapid7 company DE&I efforts",
  link: "https://www.rapid7.com/about/diversity-equity-and-inclusion/",

  link: "https://www.rapid7.com/about/news/",

}, {
  title: "Study Abroad Web App",

  link: "http://saimap.digital.conncoll.edu/",
  type: "design project"
}, {
  title: "Portland Maine Brew App",

  type: "design project"
}];

sourcesContent:
const projects = [
    {
        title: "Little Lemon Table Res",
        image: require('../img/newsroom.png'),
        stack: "Figma, React, JS, HTML, CSS, Jest",
        summary: "SPA with a table reservation system, built using React",
        description: "Developed a SPA with a table reservation system. Created user personas, wireframes, and mockups prior to implementation. Built UI components with React and used a mock API to determine available reservation times. Conducted unit tests with Jest",
        link: "https://github.com/jdearden4/meta-front-end/tree/main/Capstone/little-lemon",
        type: "dev project"
    },
    {
        title: "To Do App",
        stack: "React, CSS",
        image: require('../img/todo.png'),
        summary: "Simple to-do app using React",
        description: "Developed a simple to-do aplication that allows users to keep a list of inputted tasks. Used useState and hooks to achieve functionality, and the Styled-component library for styling",
        link: "https://github.com/jdearden4/todo-app",
        type: "dev project"
    },
    {
        title: "Fundamentals Pages",
        stack: "C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS, JS",
        image: require('../img/fundamentals.png'),
        summary: "Reworking of Rapid7's fundamentals page using C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",
        description: "Spearheaded back-end strategy, development, and front end development for Fundamentals pages. Lead development implementation that allowed for 80+ pages with existing data to be reworked, elevated, and dynamically populated",
        link: "https://github.com/jdearden4/todo-app",
        type: "dev project"
    },
    {
        title: "Customer Pages",
        stack: "C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS, VUE.JS",
        image: require('../img/customer.png'),
        summary: "Refresh of Rapid7's customer pages using C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",
        description: "Lead back-end strategy, development, and QA efforts for three new customer-related page templates. Assisted with front-end development. Created multiple blocks and pages that dynamically pull in data to enhance content-editor's CMS experience",
        link: "https://github.com/jdearden4/todo-app",
        type: "dev project"
    },
    {
        title: "Homepage Redesign",
        stack: "C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",
        image: require('../img/homepage.png'),
        summary: "Building new Rapid7 hompeage blocks and designs using C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",
        description: "Helped with back-end planning/development and assisted with front-end development of a complete homepage refresh and two new offer pages. Worked under pressure and time constraints to get the pages designed, developed, and QA'ed in under a week",
        link: "https://www.rapid7.com",
        type: "dev project"
    },
    {
        title: "OneTrust Cookie Compliance",
        stack: "JS, GTM, C#",
        image: require('../img/onetrust.png'),
        summary: "Implementing Rapid7's cookie compliance solution using JS, GTM, and OneTrust",
        description: "Net-new back-end template to showcase new collage-based blocks and an extension of an existing theme. See me on the kickball team~",
        link: "https://www.rapid7.com",
        type: "dev project"
    },
    {
        title: "Social Good Page",
        stack: "C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",
        image: require('../img/socialgood.png'),
        summary: "Creating a page showcasing Rapid7's social good initiatives using C#, .NET, HTML and SCSS",
        description: "Implemented a brand new cookie compliance solution from OneTrust with multiple compliance models that integrate with GTM and our existing server-side cookie implementation",
        link: "https://www.rapid7.com/about/social-good/",
        type: "dev project"
    },
    {
        title: "Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Page",
        stack: "C#, .NET, HTML, SCSS",
        image: require('../img/DEI.png'),
        summary: "Building a page to highlight Rapid7's DEI commitment using C#, .NET, SCSS, and HTML",
        description: "Net-new back-end template to showcase a new theme, new block types, and Rapid7 company DE&I efforts",
        link: "https://www.rapid7.com/about/diversity-equity-and-inclusion/",
        type: "dev project"
    },
    {
        title: "Newsroom",
        stack: "HTML, SCSS, JS, Sketch, InDesign, Illustrator",
        image: require('../img/newsroom.png'),
        summary: "Researching, Designing, and developing a newsroom for Rapid7",
        description: "Revamped a simple 3-column basic layout to a completely new page template including a carousel header and dynamically pulled in content. Lead design and development",
        link: "https://www.rapid7.com/about/news/",
        type: "design project"
    },
    {
        title: "Study Abroad Web App",
        stack: "HTML, CSS, JS, Sketch, Mapbox, SQL, PHP",
        image: require('../img/studyabroad.png'),
        summary: "Following UX/UI pipeline, created a study abroad web app using HTML, CSS, Sketch, and PHP",
        description: "Implemented a map web application to help Connecticut College students find different study abroad programs. Co-lead all iterations of the design thinking process and the full development lifecycle",
        link: "http://saimap.digital.conncoll.edu/",
        type: "design project"
    },
    {
        title: "Portland Maine Brew App",
        stack: "Adobe Animate, ActionScript, Illustrator",
        image: require('../img/brewapp.png'),
        summary: "Designing an app that showcases Portland Maine's beer scene using Adobe Illustrator, ActionScript, and Animate",
        description: "Designed and developed a local app that explores the Portland, Maine beer scene, complete with an interactive map of breweries",
        link: "",
        type: "design project"

    },
    {
        title: "Dodger - EEL Inc.",
        stack: "Unity 3D, C#, Photoshop",
        image: require('../img/EEL.png'),
        summary: "Creating an interactive game using Unity 3D, C#, Photoshop",
        description: "Founded EEL. Inc and developed our debut game Dodger, which won a peer award for most creative game. Acted as lead designer and front-end developer",
        link: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c9wKpYM0IZo",
        type: "design project"

    },
];


export default projects;
